website_summaries.verdict: One of the easier tower speaker sets to install on a number of toys and vehicles.
pros: Uses larger speakers with the tweeter built over the subwoofer to maximize the compact design
8-inch poly cone woofer and titanium dome tweeter
Top clamps are easy to fasten to any round tube or mounting bracket
Works well with or without an amp
cons: Construction quality is too low to survive heavy waves or off-roading

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the money..
customer_reviews.text: Let me say first they are not the loudest speakers you can get. But for only 80 bucks for 2. I didn't expect that. I installed this on my 09 rsr 800 with the pyle hydra amp and was pleased with them. You get food sound but not a lot of bass which I'm good with. And it's nice that I can add 2 more and only be at 200 bucks for everything. I have yet to have it on the woods with them but I'm happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Donald  Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Rewire the resistors to a more secure position inside the housing so they will not break
customer_reviews.text: The resistors are just superglued on. I live in AZ and within the first use I lost audio, the weight of the resistors broke the internal audio cables while in motion. I had to reconfigure the wiring and replace the resistors because the contact legs had broken internally
customer_reviews.author: Jrv_40

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big physically
customer_reviews.text: eh.... Not really what I was hoping for. Pretty big physically, but not really in sound. Almost no low end. Maybe that's to be expected. Installed one side on my jeep roll bar no problems. Other side though, 2 of the screws immediately stripped out the PLASTIC mount. Which looks like it can be replaced, if anyone would contact me back. Please?
customer_reviews.author: Turfdraagster

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain for the money. Good sound. Serves the purpose!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy L.

customer_reviews.title: Doa
customer_reviews.text: One stop playing with first week return them. Would have keep them if that didnot happen
customer_reviews.author: tracey warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in my 1994 Jeep Wrangler that I take off roading, mainly rock climb and trail riding. Have them powered off a Sony 4x50 head unit as the rear speakers. Sounds great, I bought an amp but currently not using, Sound just as good coming out of the head unit vs amp.
customer_reviews.author: Me the Buyer!

customer_reviews.title: Front cover  rusted out relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Thought since they were marine speakers this would not happen at least not as soon. Sound is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: lmwlpw

customer_reviews.title: Not for off roading
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my rzr. Broke off the mounts on the first ride. The speakers might weight too much for the plastic mounts. Had to buy empty tower mounts to put these speakers in. The speakers them self are nice. Great sound highs and lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ok speakers.
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice set but all the mounts ate plastic so I just hope they will hold, ateast will not rust. Sound is ok, just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vasy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these speakers on my Side by Side hooked up to an 800w Pyle marine amp and they sound awesome. The mounts are plastic but seem rugged, I've been out smashing around on some rough trails and mud holes and so far they are holding up.. Great speaker for the price..
customer_reviews.author: gunner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was exactly as described. Made very sturdy. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: pushing these at 100watts rms sound great but pushed to loud there is some bass distortion ...
customer_reviews.text: pushing these at 100watts rms sound great but pushed to loud there is some bass distortion and highs could be more crisp but for the price they are doing a fine job
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: They sound good I think it needs A small amp I have ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound good I think it needs A small amp I have them on a factory radio On a Suzuki samurai On a roll bar
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Mounted in my jku.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted them in the back of a 2010 Jeep wrangler jk. They sound amazing. Side note for anyone thinking about mounting them to the factory cage. Buy longer bolts. About 1/2 an inch longer works. Wish the mounts were metal like pictured. -1 star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good speaker!
customer_reviews.text: were not as loud as I would have wanted them to be, but that very well could have been my amps problem!
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: Sound great. I didn't use the mounts so I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: These work well on a small amp. Sound great. I didn't use the mounts so I didn't have any issue with those
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Sounds really good.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are big, I didn't realize how big they actually are, and they were easy to install, I think they look expensive and they sound really good. It's nice that they have a wire to hold them in case the bracket breaks or comes loose also. Overall happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good sound fair price
customer_reviews.text: Like the product not top of the line but not bad quality for the price. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Paul huskey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant really beat it for the price, plenty loud enough for my v8 jeep buggy
customer_reviews.author: Connor R.

customer_reviews.title: "Sounds great on my RZR"
customer_reviews.text: I have the 8" speakers and they sound great hooked straight to reciever. Haven't decided on amp yet but hope to do so before it warms up. I put these on my RZR 900 Stealth. They have plenty of bass and are crystal clear and loud. I know once i put an amp in they will sound even better. Very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what you'd expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what you'd expect for the price. Have been on a couple rough rides since we've had them and the brackets have held up fine. They're not as loud as we would like but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Was a gift and they love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ryanlabute

customer_reviews.title: Works great and sounds great for the money but if your ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and sounds great for the money but if your installing on 2.5 wake bar you well need longer bolts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers on my commander! Only problem I had was the mounts aren't that great. Lost the screws out of them on the first ride. It was a pretty rough ride though and they sounded great!!
customer_reviews.author: AUDRAlynn

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after getting caught in rain on the water.
customer_reviews.text: They sound good but quit working the first time we got caught in the rain on the water. Go for actual marine speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: great sound out of these for the price
customer_reviews.text: great sound out of these for the price. they are a little bigger then what I thought they'd be, but for the price and sound I like them !!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my RZR, a little on the large side, just the way I like. They sound great and project well. I would recommend these to anyone looking for speakers for a wake tower or UTV. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jstoner

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the price. I’ll be ordering me two more soon
customer_reviews.author: james buchta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers for the money. Had to buy longer bolts to install on my 2015 rzr but theyes work great
customer_reviews.author: Double BB

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my sxs sounds great fire the money
customer_reviews.author: Travis and Amie marchand

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set I have ordered for my RZR.. works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the price. They sound great without an Amp on my 23ft boat.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took out of box and hooked up to stereo and they both worked and sounded clear. Haven't actually installed yet. The shipping was really really fast. I already ordered a pair of the 6.5s
customer_reviews.author: Thomas b

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Inexpensive Durable Decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my SxS. Cheap too so you won't care if you bust one on a limb or rollover.
customer_reviews.author: Big Smooth

customer_reviews.title: description was a little off, but was too be expected especially for a boat tower
customer_reviews.text: had the intentions of using on a MC then a Jetski, but changed my mind due to the size. Looking at using them as outdoor speakers around the house.
customer_reviews.author: LIL Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these speakers are awesome i couldn't be more happy with them
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound great. Clamps fit the jeep roll bar but the bolts were too short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price, shipped in 3 days, sounds really good and looks great on my rzr,got a marine enrock 800 watt amp to them
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked how good these sound for the money. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Art Daven

customer_reviews.title: perfect for mounting on a roll
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with the sound of these speakers. perfect for mounting on a roll cage
customer_reviews.author: P. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the money just make sure to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for the money just make sure to put something in the gap between the mount and the speaker or It will flop
customer_reviews.author: Cody Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my wakeboard boat tower.. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my wakeboard boat tower.. Had to buy bigger screws for the larger tubing, but no big deal!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for the price. Put out plenty of sound. The only thing I found wrong so far is the mounting brackets. In the picture they look metal but when I got them they were a black plastic.
customer_reviews.author: josh stiers

customer_reviews.title: They sound really good just being powered by the head unit but after ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound really good just being powered by the head unit but after adding an amp the difference is unreal. I hooked them to a rockford pbr 300x4 and wow!! Either way you power them they sound good but if you really want to feel the music I suggest some type of amp.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awsome speakers with good sound! You need a good amp to push
customer_reviews.text: Awsome speakers with good sound! You need a good amp to push!! Only thing is there pretty big n bulky looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Gamboa III

customer_reviews.title: wake board speakers
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about these, I bout them for my off road buggy havnt been in the woods yet with them but hooked them up and I am amazed with the sound not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my RZR. The sound is good and lould. Speakers sound just as good as any other.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for mounting on polaris ranger roll bar. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Mounts could be stronger but sound great with the right signal.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: They work and sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Hung them from the tool bar in my UTV facing the rear. They work and sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Jon F. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Plastic mounts
customer_reviews.text: Mounts are s*** and made of plastic and it came with the wrong bolts sound is okay bit there are cheap
customer_reviews.author: zac

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great! I mounted these on my rzr and for $88 you can beat them. I have them hooked to a 800w amp and if I turn them up all the way they distort, but for the price they are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very loud deep sound mounted on my jeep wrangler tj. just bought different bolts
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sound better than expected can't beat them at this price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing more than a speaker in a plastic housing, they have hardly any bass, they distort honorably, I ended up dropping one during install, and the speaker mounting bracket busted off inside the enclosure. I had to modify the mounts to make them work, the factory bolts were stripped, so they had to be drilled out. I installed larger hardware. I should have returned them upon receipt, but I kept telling myself, I can make them work. I wanted to try these to save some money, headphones would be a better choice that these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Hopefully they'll last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Small with good sound. I try to install them on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Small with good sound. I try to install them on a 11⁄4" T-Top tube and it was loose. My boat is not that new, so I used screws to fix it to the T-Top.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A. Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: These things rock.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these as well as 2 power acoustic 8" tubs on my yamaha viking sxs all running off a 240 MB QUART amp and they are loud as hell with great mids, highs and bass. I get lots of compliments on the sound while out muddin. Have had no issues with the mounts at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the waterproof part and they look like a well ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the waterproof part and they look like a well designed UTV speaker but they just sound OK. Really no lows for an 8 inch speaker. I plan to add a sub to fix the sound. The connections are a little cheesy. I hope the mounts hold up. I have seen reviews that say they break. So far ,mine have held up.
customer_reviews.author: jason s.

customer_reviews.title: An damn they are amazing. Id recommend these speakers to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked these up on my new 2014 kawasaki teryx 800. An damn they are amazing. Id recommend these speakers to anyone. Thinkin about buyin another set!
customer_reviews.author: cory evick

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on my side by side, along with a cheap 500 watt "Mitzu" amp (found on ebay for under $40). I was nothing but impressed with the speakers and the amp. If you're looking for an inexpensive sound set up on a side by side, these along with a decent amp work well. I will say the mounts may be a bit weak(they are plastic) but as long as you don't over-tighten them they will hold just fine. I didn't want to give 4 out of 5 stars for this minor flaw... overall they are worth the money by far.
customer_reviews.author: JFRED

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of speakers to mount on a Jetboat wake tower. I am very happy with the output and sound of the sound system and this greatly due to the speakers. I had a small problem... One of the grills went missing. Presumably a defect in the manufacturing. The company made an extra effort to find a replacement and is provided the part. I am very happy to report their customer service did a great job - Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Junk I originally thought these were great until i used them for 2 weeks and both speakers blew out with a low power system that did not overdrive them past there rating. Its a shame that they could not use some slightly better materials but this is what you get when you by Chinese made garbage Save your cash and buy something of quality Oh yea and they are non returnable just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Magee

customer_reviews.title: MCM Custom Audio 8" Marine Wakeboard speakers
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct....very good sound for the price. Also the mounting brackets are plastic (as noted by most reviews), making them un-trustworthy. I understood that when I bought them and installed them in a way that made this not an issue. Had I not known, I would have given them a much lower rating. Again, sound and looks are very good so I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Elliano

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Pretty loud with the right amp, salt water will corrode the top portions so I put silicon over them. You can buy them for less directly from mcm but it will take awhile
customer_reviews.author: James Burns

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and order them !!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for my RZR XP 4. I have them hooked to a Kenwood amp. Music is loud, and clear even at WOT. I would recommend using with quality amp for the best sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: The photo is not what you get
customer_reviews.text: I was counting on the aluminum brackets in the image but they are black plastic
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Shugart

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof??
customer_reviews.text: Speakers work awesome I'm not to sure about how waterproof they are. I had to remove the speaker from the housing to drill out the holes just to turn the bracket 90 degrees it wasn't hard and they still work great but there was no seal around the speaker and the housing so that's why I question the waterproof. I have them mounted on the roll bar of my jeep and they sound great very load people can hear me from blocks away.
customer_reviews.author: Wrangler91

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the 8" quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought (2) 6 1/2" speakers and (2) 8" and put them on my Rzr 1000.One 8" snapped at the base after one 15 miles of easy trail riding.not very impressed with it! If anyone knows if they have replacement parts for these or warranty on the product??
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my tower these are made for smaller towers
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked we'll very impressed best bang for your buck !
customer_reviews.author: Jordan meadows

customer_reviews.title: Started off by hooking these up to a Denon 40 ...
customer_reviews.text: Started off by hooking these up to a Denon 40 wpc receiver as a benchmark. They are not particularly bass heavy, but what they will do is exactly what they need to, play at volume without distorting. If you find them to be inadequate with an in dash receiver a separate amp may be required. That being said, run on 2 channels a 50 wpc auto/marine receiver should be more than enough to drive them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathannb

customer_reviews.title: Bad support from manufacturer **Warning cheap plastic hardware**
customer_reviews.text: Hardware in pictures looks to be metal but is actually made of cheap plastic. When you tighten down the brackets the nuts slip in the plastic and prevent you from securing to the tube. When I contacted MCM to get new brackets they said I had to return both speakers to Amazon and get new ones instead of just sending me the bracket. Highly recommend going through a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds
customer_reviews.text: These warriors speakers sound good and clear through the mid-high range, but don't generate much bass, which is great for me...I didn't expect to get deep bass from them. Im happy with the purchase, although I purchased a similar set from Amazon that are identical with exception of the grills, labels and branding..
customer_reviews.author: TrueReview

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers. definitely increased DB on music from stereo. Good overall speaker for my needs. I know other brand of wake tower speakers sound better but i cant spend 500-800 on speakers. Not too much bass from these and im powering them to the max but my subwoofers handle that.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Young

customer_reviews.title: These were amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing for the price. Great sound quality. If I had to change one thing it would be the plastic brackets. They hold but the speakers tend to shake a lot when driving rougher terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Pstiles

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I mounted them right to the roll bar on 2015 Polaris ranger it goes well with pyle marine grade 600 watt amp with blue tooth durable water proof cheaper and better sounding then Polaris system.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Walker

customer_reviews.title: For the price these speakers rock out. I'm an ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these speakers rock out. I'm an old schooler that has been in a ton of boats, will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hill

customer_reviews.title: speakers seem to be OK the only down side is ...
customer_reviews.text: speakers seem to be OK the only down side is that they only mount one way has to take a part and redrill holes to mount them sideways
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they sound good just hooked to stereo without amp
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 4 star review because of the mounting. It is cheap plastic. Other than that they sound good just hooked to stereo without amp. They would scream with an amp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But man they sound good now.
customer_reviews.text: WOW what a strong speaker. Not sure how they will hold up on my Teryx . But man they sound good now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound- had to get a little longer screws to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound- had to get a little longer screws to put them on the roll cage of my Side x Side, but still loud as hell while riding
customer_reviews.author: Robert Samolinski

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to install on my Jeep roll bars. They were the perfect choice. Installed very easily and the quality of the sound is AMAZING. Great quality and awesome sound.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN COVEY

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Installed on my rzr. Plenty loud enough with amp. No problems with water or mud.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: We bought these speakers for our pontoon boat and they work great and are loud.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: While they worked they were good.
customer_reviews.text: Were blown within a week. You get what you pay for. While they worked they were good.
customer_reviews.author: MM2578

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Can't complain. Not much bass though. Get a separate sub
customer_reviews.author: Bozoman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product...... buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a set of tower speakers to add on my cage of my UTV, with all the brands available I didn't want to add another $300.00 set of speakers and have issues with them being out in the elements from riding and while cleaning it. The only issue I had was the screws used on the clamps are not the best so I replaced them.... for the additional $4.00 in screws its totally worth it, I already have two sets of 6.5" in the UTV and these ROCK!! I'm going to install another set for the rolling rock concert effect!!
customer_reviews.author: CRidgway

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my RZR and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: For price of product i would give this five star for quality of sound. Only got four stars because the mounts are plastic and little flimsy. I use this on my RZR and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Fred S

customer_reviews.title: these tings are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: these tings are amazing for the price. I run an 800 watt Pyle marine amp to them and they are LOUD and clear.
customer_reviews.author: tony steele

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a great deal for my waketower and i love them. the sound is clear and loud!
customer_reviews.author: Btowell

customer_reviews.title: These sound way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These sound way better than I expected! Easy to mount, sound great, cost cheap what more could you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them for price
customer_reviews.text: Would of Ben better if you gave the anti theft key to install them other then that they where more then I expected they should really good I happy with them so fair but the really test is on the boat I have a 89 mph speed boat we do a lot of knee boarding and tubin and we jump a lot of waves so I hoping they can handle it cause I live on lake st Clair and it's winter here so come summer I can give you a better idea
customer_reviews.author: krankerup1

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for me
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for me! put them in my rhino, only thing I don't like is how big they are. I didn't know they were this big cans and all. They are plenty loud for my trail riding/work around the property! The mounts are plastic I just followed the advice of others and didn't over tighten them. I was worried at first but I haven't cut them any slack since and no breakage issues. If your looking for good speakers at a fantastic price these are it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound is perfect for sxs and cant beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit concerned with the plastic brackets snapping on our trail rides as we ride some pretty rough areas
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. I was a bit concerned with the plastic brackets snapping on our trail rides as we ride some pretty rough areas. However so far it has held up nicely on our 2013 Polaris RZR. Sound quality is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lambert

customer_reviews.title: They Make my Rzr Xp 4 1000 look even more awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are really big which I knew they would be and I was expecting it. They fit perfect in the back of my Rzr Xp 4 1000. They look cool and not tacky. The reason they got a 4 stars, is because the speaker itself isn't that good. If you turn it up way loud like we always do, it distorts and gets crackly, but we expected to switch out the speakers for JLs anyways. So overall if you keep a reasonable volume they are great. They look good, they make my Rzr look good, and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sesha Steele

customer_reviews.title: They do add a nice amount of bass
customer_reviews.text: Mounted perfectly on the rollbar in my Jeep after I got longer bolts. They do add a nice amount of bass.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner Carvo

customer_reviews.title: The sound is decent. The housing alone is worth ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is decent. The housing alone is worth the money. Can't wait to add some bass subs after I blow these.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the $. The clamps are plastic but have lasted 2 months of hard riding.
customer_reviews.author: roman

product_meta.title: MCM Custom Audio 60-10030 8" Marine Wakeboard Two-Way Speaker Pair - White
product_meta.description: Color:WHITEDesigned for mounting on a boat’s wakeboard tower, or any suitable tube or rail, these waterproof wakeboard speakers provide excellent sound and durability in harsh marine environments.
feature_bullets: Poly cone woofer with rubber surround
Maximum mounting diameter: 1 1/2 - Minimum mounting diameter: 1 1/8

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
